topic.title: Looking for Starbound Players
topic.body:
Wanna play starbound with a small, growing community? 
send a Zeromail to jetstar for server information

topic.title: https://discord.gg/at7SPNC
topic.body: troll the crap out of them!

2_1JXFzMzrQTJCiGw36YNQGg2Tmt1hTHy7ZT.body: I'm new here, but I aim to be quite active.  I am a web developer by day, and am working on personal webby projects in my free time that I will most likely post here.
